mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Schockley, Henry Patient Age: 21. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of right foot. Location Wounded: Halltown, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/08/26. Nature of Wound: Minie ball. Result: Discharged from service.
